title: A discourse of self-murder lately written, and now published as a disswasive from so horrid and inglorious a thing. By E.P., in a letter to his intimate friend R.F. Licens'd, November 24. 1691.
author: E. P. (Ezra Pierce)
publisher: printed for A. and John Churchill, and sold by John Miller bookseller in Sherbourn in Dorsetshire,
